snippet: Michael Andretti, who has prospered as a race promoter, has been enlisted to help revamp and improve this weekend’s Grand Prix of Baltimore.
abstract: Former racecar driver Michael Andretti, who has prospered as a race promoter, has been enlisted to help revamp and improve IndyCar's Grand Prix of Baltimore.
lead_paragraph: Michael Andretti, who has prospered as a race promoter, has been enlisted to help revamp and improve this weekend’s Grand Prix of Baltimore.

headline.seo: In Baltimore Grand Prix, Michael Andretti Wants Inner Harbor to Be IndyCar’s Main Stage
headline.main: Trying to Win Race He Helped Save
headline.print_headline: Trying to Win Race He Helped Save
